author: elecharny
msg: - Added new metho with a String parameter (to avoid char array creation)
- Formated the code and change old style to new one (no more l_, a_...)

author: kenney
msg: * Fixed defaults for repositories (release true, snapshots true, layout default)
* Added support for using repositories from the poms themselves,
It's not as clean as I would like to, but there's no notion of a Project:
the repository-defining project is not added to a Dependency Chain.
* Updated DownloadFailedException to list the dep chain and the repositories

author: sanka
msg: Added new set of Classes and Interfaces which will probably goes as Neeth2. It
is based on a new architecture and contains significant improvements than

author: elecharny
msg: - Added methods which take a String parameter, to avoid array creations

author: oheger
msg: Added a clone() method to CompositeConfiguration
